title: I Hate All Of His Family And His Friends
itunes:title: I Hate All Of His Family And His Friends
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, my boyfriend of 2 years has been talking about marriage, but I hate all of his family and friends. We’re both 33 years old and we met online. I got offered a job promotion and a transfer to the city where my boyfriend grew up. We decided I’d take the job and we’d get married, so we relocated to the city that he grew up in........................

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, my boyfriend of 2 years has been talking about marriage, but I hate all of his family and friends. We’re both 33 years old and we met online. I got offered a job promotion and a transfer to the city where my boyfriend grew up. We decided I’d take the job and we’d get married, so we relocated to the city that he grew up in........................
